reasoning: Acute viral infectious disease with high incidence globally. Estimated incidence of ~2850 per 100k person-years based on WHO surveillance data and epidemiological studies of viral gastroenteritis. Significant geographic and seasonal variation; estimates include rotavirus, norovirus, and enteroviruses. Incidence varies substantially by age (much higher in children <5 years) and region.
source: WHO Global Burden of Disease estimates; multiple epidemiological studies from developed and developing countries
